de.gnwi.spicesviewer

Class ImageExportGraphAttributeWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.SwingWorker
      • de.gnwi.spicesviewer.ImageExportGraphAttributeWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture

    public class ImageExportGraphAttributeWorker
extends javax.swing.SwingWorker
    A SwingWorker extending class to export the graph as an image file by adding a 'ui.screenshot' attribute to it that the GraphStream Viewer intercepts causing it to export the graph (the visible section if it has been dragged and/or zoomed)
    Author:
    Jonas Schaub

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javax.swing.SwingWorker

        javax.swing.SwingWorker.StateValue

      protected java.lang.Object doInBackground()
      Exports the given graph by adding a 'ui.screenshot' attribute to it that the GraphStream Viewer intercepts causing it to export the graph (the visible section if it has been dragged and/or zoomed).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageExportGraphAttributeWorker

        public ImageExportGraphAttributeWorker(java.io.File anImageFile,
                                       org.graphstream.graph.implementations.SingleGraph aSingleGraph,
                                       MainFrame aMainFrame,
                                       UserPreferences aUserPreferences,
                                       Controller aController)
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor: Tests the parameters and assigns them to the object's fields.
        Parameters:
        anImageFile - to which the image should be saved; It must not exist on the hard drive already and must be of type .bmp, .png or .jpg
        aSingleGraph - the graph to be exported
        aMainFrame - The MainFrame where to write a message at success or failure
        aUserPreferences - to draw the color of the message in the MainFrame from
        aController - the instantiating Controller instance for showing a message in the MainFrame's status bar when the image export is successful
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one parameter is 'null', the image file already exists on the hard drive, the image file is not of type .bmp, .png or .jpg, the graph has no nodes or the UserPreferences' 'valid' color is 'null'

    • Method Detail

      • doInBackground

        protected java.lang.Object doInBackground()
                                   throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Exports the given graph by adding a 'ui.screenshot' attribute to it that the GraphStream Viewer intercepts causing it to export the graph (the visible section if it has been dragged and/or zoomed). The thread sleeps for Constants.WAITING_TIME_MILLIS_FOR_IMAGE_EXPORT_BY_GRAPHATTRIBUTE divided by Constants.WAITING_STEPS_FOR_IMAGE_EXPORT_BY_GRAPHATTRIBUTE milliseconds and then checks afterwards if the image file has been successfully written to the hard drive. If it has not the thread waits again and tries anew afterwards until Constants.WAITING_STEPS_FOR_IMAGE_EXPORT_BY_GRAPHATTRIBUTE steps have been gone through. If the image file does not exist until then a JOptionPane message is shown.
        Specified by:
        doInBackground in class javax.swing.SwingWorker
        Returns:
        null
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the thread is interrupted while it sleeps
